website_summaries.verdict: The perfect storage solution for animal lovers, and its super strong design makes this an especially versatile choice for hanging a wider variety of items, especially when compared to flimsier models.
pros: Available in 3 adorable designs: cats, dogs, and deer
Two-piece construction ensures a snug fit over all doors
Each hook can hold up to 16 pounds
cons: While these over door hook racks are charmingly styled, they are only available in black

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy and great looking
customer_reviews.text: Love this. I was worried that (because it just hooks together) it wouldn’t be sturdy or would come unhooked but it’s been great. It has been holding my heavy wool coat, some accessories and my kids coats with no issues. I’m super happy with it and it’s very cute.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica Guptill

customer_reviews.title: I love this door hanger
customer_reviews.text: I love this door hanger! It is sturdy and well made, and it is so cute! It does a great job of holding our coats, jackets, and bags. It isn't welded together like a lot of other door hangers, so you won't have to worry about it breaking. The hooks that go over the door are quite thin, so most doors should be able to shut with this hanging on it.
customer_reviews.author: Jackie

customer_reviews.title: Quality Steel, Cushions to prevent door damage - Love it!
customer_reviews.text: Attention all cat lovers: Buy this! It's fashioned of steel, so very durable. It comes with cushioning to stick on the hanger where it comes in contact with the door, so the hanger won't damage the door. I've dried blankets and hung winter coats on it. Am considering getting another for another door in my home. ♥ it
customer_reviews.author: Naomi Sasse

customer_reviews.title: Looks really nice over the door.
customer_reviews.text: This is light, but has a look of cast iron. It holds many heavy jackets and my full purse with ease. The width of the hook is a bit wide for my door, but that's ok. It just means that it will fit a wider door, should I need it to. It doesn't move around the door, even though the hooks are bit wide. It doesn't come with some strips to hold it in place on the door should you want to use them though. It looks wonderful over the door. It looks much more expensive than it is. I would not hesitate to purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: Bamgela

customer_reviews.title: The way it fits together is not optimal. It ...
customer_reviews.text: The way it fits together is not optimal. It detracts from the quality in both look and feel. It works but the hooks are not deep. Hard to hang a coat or jacket. If something gets hung in the hook you risk bringing the whole thing down because of the way ithe cats snap on to the down hooks. Would not buy again, some people would probably return because of the construction issue.
customer_reviews.author: Zakko's Mom

customer_reviews.title: Cute Over the Door Hanging Device
customer_reviews.text: So much prettier than the white plastic contraption I was using to air dry my unmentionables from. Will likely purchase another for my sweaters and scarves. Yes, bonafide cat-lady here.
customer_reviews.author: Dawn E

customer_reviews.title: Fun kitty rack!
customer_reviews.text: I got this as a present for my girlfriend who is a cat fanatic and she absolutely loved it. It was not difficult to assemble, she put it together within just a few minutes and hung it from her door. It currently holds all her necklaces and bracelets. You can't really go wrong with this for cat lovers!
customer_reviews.author: Andy G

customer_reviews.title: Cute hanger
customer_reviews.text: The design is cute and the metal sturdy. It is a fun over the door hanger! The one negative i have ia this; the edges are not ground down enough to be smooth. So if i am not careful, i will cut my finger if i run it along the cut edge. This wasn't enough of an issue for me to return it, however, i have no small children that can be harmed in my house.
customer_reviews.author: Mendocino King

customer_reviews.title: Adorable and worth it
customer_reviews.text: Assembles a little weird. Just slips on to small hook/grooves. Could easily come apart if bumped up. But it is very cute and it won’t bend. It was a good price too. Also the double sided tape/padding came in handy because the door was thinner than the hooks and now it isn’t clunking against it.
customer_reviews.author: Kt J

customer_reviews.title: Great product-very well made
customer_reviews.text: I RESCUE Cats so when I saw this item I had to have it.It arrived today and I am impressed with how well made it is.I purchased two of them and they both for on My front door so no more running back to My bedroom for My coats and rain jackets.I am on My way to see if I have any empty doors so I can get more.
customer_reviews.author: SuzyQ                                                                              Suzanne Williams

customer_reviews.title: Fun way to decorate.
customer_reviews.text: After rescuing a mother and 5 kitten, I have a room dedicated to littler boxes and cat items. This cat rack is on the outside of the door and is a great place to store their toys. It looks cute and even holds a Christmas wreath.
customer_reviews.author: Jo Picard

customer_reviews.title: Cute and steady
customer_reviews.text: It is very cute and steady hanger. Each hook is bit too close each other but works for most of stuff to hang. We have a tall door and it is for my sons room. It’s bit too high for him. Only wish if these are adjustable heights. But over all great product!
customer_reviews.author: Naoko Shibata

customer_reviews.title: Cheaply made
customer_reviews.text: The adhesive provided is cheap does not stick at all had to use double sided tape it is not heavy duty the metal can bend by hand and the hooks are not bent to a standard door width overall the only good thing is the cat cut out this product is false advertising
customer_reviews.author: josh miller

customer_reviews.title: Usfull and pretty
customer_reviews.text: It holds all my coats and it looks good I love it
customer_reviews.author: cheryl f.

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely beautiful!!!
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely beautiful! Easy to put together. I didn’t know how sturdy it would be but it is Extremely sturdy. I love, love, love mine!
customer_reviews.author: Jacque

customer_reviews.title: You have a better choice
customer_reviews.text: I totally agree with a reviewer's feedback that this product isn't optimal as the description describes. When I hung it on my door, it doesn't fit with the door so smoothly so when I open and close the door, it always "flies" up to the air and falls down. The construction and quality isn't really ideal, and it feels so cheap. I don't think it has the quality to be sold for $16 dollars. It is made in China, to answer some buyer's question.
customer_reviews.author: H/H

customer_reviews.title: Easy Assembly
customer_reviews.text: Works great & even comes with little pads to out between the metal & the door.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Super cute
customer_reviews.text: We are using it in my daughter's room on the outside of her closet to hold jackets, hoodies, etc. Very pleased with it.
customer_reviews.author: TC in SC

customer_reviews.title: Good basic coat rack
customer_reviews.text: Overall a good deal; sturdy, easy to assemble and install, cats look cute. One minor problem: the upturned ends of the hooks are a bit rough around the edges. I noticed when my coat got a loose thread caught on one. No big deal; it could be fixed with a little filing or some smooth tape over the rough bits. It’d be nice if that was done at the factory though.
customer_reviews.author: Dusty Keyboard

customer_reviews.title: easy to hang
customer_reviews.text: i have several coats and sweaters hung on this and it holds up. looks very cute.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Cute cats
customer_reviews.text: I collect cats-this is a great addition to my collection. Cute AND functional.Cute cats
customer_reviews.author: TLK

customer_reviews.title: Very Cute and Useful!
customer_reviews.text: Sturdy, cute coat/hat rack that I use all the time. I liked it so much, I bought one as a gift for a cat-loving friend as well. Very pleased!
customer_reviews.author: L. J.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for hanging leashes!
customer_reviews.text: Easy to install, easy to assemble - Plus its adorable! I super recommend this :D
customer_reviews.author: TG AGAPE

customer_reviews.title: Cute and sturdy
customer_reviews.text: This door hook is cute and functional. It has a ton of sturdy hooks and comes with foam pad so it doesn't rub directly on your door.
customer_reviews.author: Melanie C.

customer_reviews.title: Does the trick and super cute!
customer_reviews.text: I normally just it with a couple heavy towels-- need to make sure not to have them all on one end or else it may come undone but other than that is great and cute!
customer_reviews.author: E

customer_reviews.title: Cute and sturdy
customer_reviews.text: Held about 4 purses that weigh 40lbs all together and didn't seem to stress it at all
customer_reviews.author: Teddy

customer_reviews.title: Good quality
customer_reviews.text: I bought this as a gift for my cat loving daughter. It’s good and sturdy and adds a decorative touch to her door. It installs easily and fit beautifully over a standard door.
customer_reviews.author: Mamalhe

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy and cute
customer_reviews.text: Why use a boring over the door hook hanger when you can get one with cute CATS?! That was my reasoning and I’m happy with the quality and cuteness. Might buy another.
customer_reviews.author: Julie B.

customer_reviews.title: SO CUTE!!!
customer_reviews.text: I love this so much! I never knew anything like this existed! It's better than screwing your wall and damaging it if you didn't like putting a hanging on. Plus it makes my room look decorative
customer_reviews.author: Taylor

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy
customer_reviews.text: I'm a cat lover so it's cute, I put over a closet door near front entrance I come in and hang my coat,
customer_reviews.author: Susan Bedell

customer_reviews.title: Works well and looks nice
customer_reviews.text: Fits over the top of my old solid wood door and holds lots of winter coats. Pleased with my purchase.

customer_reviews.title: whimsical organizer
customer_reviews.text: Adorable gift for my friend the cat lover! Great and cute way to organize space

customer_reviews.title: Product looks flimsy and may not hold the 2Kg combined load advertised

customer_reviews.author: Shuan Pei Cheong

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what I wanted
customer_reviews.text: Really cute and fit well over my sticky garage door :) I was afraid I wouldn't be able to close the door because we already struggle with it but nope! No additional issues. The metal feels a little flimsy but I've hung a couple of half full backpacks on it no problem.

customer_reviews.title: For dog lovers
customer_reviews.text: We think this book is adorable! We are currently using it in the bathroom to hold about four towels and two robes! It does the job and expresses our personality!

customer_reviews.title: PERFECT! :)
customer_reviews.text: I was even able to paint it before giving it to my mom for her birthday. :)

customer_reviews.title: Very cute and functional!
customer_reviews.text: This product is very durable and adorable! I wouldn’t recommend hanging multiple heavy bags from it though, as it tends to put stress on the rack. Perfect for hanging coats and a few small bags on though!

customer_reviews.title: Works perfect for lightweight jackets
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this for staff to hand their scrub jackets etc in our clinic when not wearing them. Works perfect for light jackets, is cute and serves it's purpose well for us. It would not be best for heavier items as it is a little flimsy since the metal is thin so 4 stars for that reason.

customer_reviews.title: Cute and sturdy but adhesive doesn't work

customer_reviews.title: It's cute as well as practical.
customer_reviews.text: I like the look of this item as well as its usefulness.

customer_reviews.text: There was nothing to dislike about this item. I have a cat so I love it. I got it more for show than for use.

customer_reviews.title: Cute, but I'm skeptical

customer_reviews.title: sturdy material, nice that you can put on the ...
customer_reviews.text: sturdy material, nice that you can put on the wall or over the door. the doors in a trailer are not as heavy as regular house doors so it would sit loose over the door, but it still hangs ok. however i will be mounting it on the wall. goes great with my room decor. just what i ordered
customer_reviews.author: Bj Neumann

customer_reviews.title: It's pretty and has nice size hooks on it
customer_reviews.text: I put this hanger on the back of the door in my guest bathroom (which is known as the cat bathroom since their litter boxes reside in there). It's pretty and has nice size hooks on it. It also hangs lower than many over-the-door racks so I can easily hang things on it.
customer_reviews.author: dixiepeach

customer_reviews.title: I love the cat motif
customer_reviews.text: I love the cat motif, which is why I ordered it, however, it does not stay put together very well. The two hanging hook pieces do not stay attached to the cat hook piece. It come with double stick tape which would work, if you are not worried about damaging the finish on your doors. I am. I will figure out a way to put them together and hang them securely without using the potentially door damaging tape, but having to do so is disappointing.
customer_reviews.author: Amelia Mitz

customer_reviews.title: So cute!
customer_reviews.text: This is so cute! I hung it on my bathroom door for towels/robes/pajamas! It's not thick enough to interfere with the door, is strong enough to hold anything I hang on it and it is cute as heck!
customer_reviews.author: Yayy

customer_reviews.title: Don’t buy this!
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely hate it! I want my money back! Very dangerous metal edges. Cannot put it together! Won’t fit into designated slots. I want my money back!
customer_reviews.author: Cheryl White

customer_reviews.title: Flimsy, not one piece
customer_reviews.text: This item looked so promising. In reality, it is flimsy and is not one piece. The hook part is separate from the two pieces that allow the item to hang. Those hooks do not click in so they stay one connected unit, they easily come in and out. Overall there is nothing I am excited about with this item. It functions, as long as I don't move it. Would not buy again or gift to anyone.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Ehh
customer_reviews.text: This is super cute but very cheaply made. I love the cats but it honestly doesn’t hold that much weight. I wanted to replace my old one but instead I kept my old one and am using this one to hang up my dog and cat leashes as well as their harnesses. Works good for that, not really for clothes
customer_reviews.author: Lizzy Grace

customer_reviews.title: Super awesome for smaller items.
customer_reviews.text: Great hanger for small items. Not appropriate for larger jackets. The hooks are very close together so this is ideal for small sweaters purses or small items. I live the design and it’s very easy to install. Overall I love it since I live in Texas and all my jackets are small anyway.
customer_reviews.author: Miranda PachecoTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: Rustic deco, not ideal for every day use
customer_reviews.text: Really like the design, it adds a nice rustic look that matches my decor. However this this is really small, the his are so close together you can only hang a coat spaced every two hooks apart. (3 total coats) I'll keep for decor, but does not hold very much.
customer_reviews.author: Tabitha

customer_reviews.title: So Stinkin' Cute!
customer_reviews.text: I love this over the door cat hanger! It's super quality and assembly was easy. The only prob is it tight at the top of the door I needed to use it on so it is noisy and scratches a bit when I open and close the door, but it's so cute that it's worth it!
customer_reviews.author: L. Grasl

customer_reviews.title: Thick metal, sturdy hooks, adorable!
customer_reviews.text: This adorable hanger is simple to assemble, if you can even call it that, and looks great against my knotty pine, barn style door where it houses my winter scarves (I bought the black version). If you love cats, you'll love this sturdy, well made hanger!

product_meta.title: Wintek Over the Door Hook Hanger, Heavy Duty Organizer Rack for Towel, Hat,Hoodies,Coat , Cloth,Bag - 8 Hooks (Black)
product_meta.description: Size:catABOUT WINTEK OVER DOOR HOOKS The Wintek Classic Over Door Hook Hanger creates instant organization in kitchens, hallways, entryways, garages, and bathrooms. Simply hang over any standard interior door. This door organizer hook provides hooks for hanging and organizing backpacks, coats, umbrellas, purses, belts, towels, bathrobes and more. What's surprised that the hook can be adhered on wall with stickers in package. Two installation ways as you like. Features Simple style Optimized details Multi-purpose for bedroom / bathroom / closet / enter way door Fit all doors from 1-1/2'' to 1-3/4'' thickness Stain Resistant & rustproof. Package list 1 * Over door hook 2 * Arms 2 *Stickers If you are not satisfied with the our over door hooks, just return it within 30 days for a full refund. No questions asked, no hassle. LIMITED TIME PRICING: Buy now to take advantage of the limited-time special pricing!
feature_bullets: ✅Universal fit:  the over door hanging rack is 15-4/5 inches wide and 6-2/5 inches tall with a 1-4/5 inch wide arm that is built to fit most interior home doors and front doors.
✅Save space: stay organized with hooks perfect for hanging towels, clothes, coats, robes, keys, shirts, pants, bags etc.
✅Two  installation: you can connect two parts together by putting the hooks into the hole. Moreover, you can stick it on the wall. Two pieces of stickers are included.
✅Easy assembly: easily install the door organizer rack in just a few minutes without any tools required and leave your walls completely intact without holes.

✅Money BACK : We think you're going to love this over door hooks as much as we do. But in case you don't, just return it within 30 days for a full refund, no questions asked. We want our customers to be 100% satisfied.

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.6 out of 5 stars471 ratings4.6 out of 5 stars
